name: 2048 Bombs!
description:
Swipe the tiles to move them - when two tiles with the same number touch they merge into one. For example: 2+2 = 4, 4+4 = 8 etc...

Three different game modes:
- Classic 2048
- 6x6 grid
- Timed mode - score as many points as you can in 60 seconds

Can you get the 2048 tile? If you can, why not keep going and get 4096, or 8192? What about a 16384 tile???

If you are struggling you can use a Double Bomb to double the value of a tile, or a Remove Bomb to remove it from the game board.

Features Game Center leaderboards and achievements.
